meaningMnemonic: You know this is a verb from the する. Your <kanji>feeling</kanji>s have been <kanji>move</kanji>d. So, when your feelings have been moved, you are emotionally moved. This word is <vocabulary>to be emotionally moved</vocabulary> or simply <vocabulary>to be moving</vocabulary>. Just be sure to know this has to do with emotions.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
